name: Tofu Scramble
instructions: In a large pan, sauté diced onions in olive oil until translucent.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture.
Stir in arborio rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Add a splash of white wine and stir until absorbed.
Gradually add warm vegetable broth, one ladle at a time, stirring frequently.
Continue adding broth and stirring until rice is creamy and tender, about 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, and finish with a sprinkle of parmesan cheese.
description: A protein-packed breakfast that mimics scrambled eggs but is completely plant-based.

description: A classic Italian dish with layers of breaded eggplant, cheese, and tomato sauce.
